text: New immunosuppressive drug PNU156804 blocks <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - dependent proliferation and NF-kappa B and AP-1 activation .
We had previously shown that the drug undecylprodigiosin ( UP ) blocks human lymphocyte proliferation in vitro .
We have now investigated the mechanism of action of a new analogue of UP , PNU156804 , which shows a more favorable activity profile than UP in mice .

We demonstrate here that the biological effect of PNU156804 in vitro is indistinguishable from UP : PNU156804 blocks human T cell proliferation in mid-late G1 , as determined by cell cycle analysis , expression of cyclins , and cyclin - dependent kinases and retinoblastoma phosphorylation .

In addition , we show that PNU156804 does not block significantly the induction of either <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or IL-2R alpha- and gamma-chains but inhibits <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - dependent T cell proliferation .

text: We have investigated several molecular pathways that are known to be activated by <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in T cells .
We show that PNU156804 does not inhibit <extra_id_0> c-myc <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> bcl-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA induction .

text: On the other hand , PNU156804 efficiently inhibits the activation of the NF-kappa B and AP-1 transcription factors .

PNU156804 inhibition of NF-kappa B activation is due to the inhibition of the degradation of <extra_id_0> I kappa B-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> I kappa B-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

text: PNU156804 action is restricted to some signaling pathways ; it does not affect NF-kappa B activation by PMA in T cells but blocks that induced by <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> cross-linking in B lymphocytes .

We conclude that the prodigiosin family of immunosuppressants is a new family of molecules that show a novel target specificity clearly distinct from that of other immunosuppressive drugs such as cyclosporin A , FK506 , and rapamycin .
